scripts.electron-dev: (npx cap copy electron && npx cap open electron)
scripts.electron-build: (cd electron && npx cap copy electron && npx electron-packager . --overwrite --icon ./assets/icon)
scripts.package:publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.nextron-ci: npm ci && cd electron && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.nextron-dev: npm run build && npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && npm run electron-dev
scripts.nextron-build: npm run build && npm run export && npx rimraf electron/app && npx cap copy electron && npm run electron-build
